author: serge
msg: Hardcoded serialization of MailImpl and MailAddress so that from James 1.2 on, these objects can be deserialized across James versions.

author: serge
msg: Initial commit of Ivan Seskar's UsersTownRepository.  Need to test more, generate some SQL scripts, and document.

author: serge
msg: Added Prasanna's little test program to recreate "stuck file" problem.  This package can become a growing collection of utilities to benchmark and test features of James.  Perhaps we'll move this to a different part of the CVS tree.
